attributes.action: Reduction of IELTS band score for doctors (Foundation Programme) and accept OET
attributes.background: Many doctors are struggling to pursue their career because of this, although specialized doctors can use OET, and use their NHS experience for English Language Proficiency, which is unfair.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions which call for actions that are the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. This would be a decision for the General Medical Council (GMC), which is independent of both the Government and Parliament.

You could raise the issue with the GMC. You can find out how to contact the GMC here:

https://www.gmc-uk.org/contact-us
